Description:
ForceV1 asks for information directly from the kernel space. Conhost connects to the console application. High IntegrityLevel means the process is running with elevated privileges, such as an Administrator context.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious High IntegrityLevel Conhost Legacy Option
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (integrity_level = 'high' or integrity_level = 's-1-16-12288') and (command like '%conhost.exe%' and command like '%0xffffffff%' and command like '%-forcev1%')
